Name: Haunted House™
About the game: Dare to be scared! After 30 years, Atari's classic groundbreaking game is back - with all-new scream-worthy chills and thrills! With spooky enemies lurking around every corner, are you brave enough to enter the Haunted House? KEY FEATURES: Explore the dark depths of Graves Mansion - find your way through 20 dark and eerie levels - just don't let the ghosts send you running scared! Uncover dark secrets - solve the mystery of what happened to your long-lost grandfather!
